import React ,{useState , useEffect} from "react"; import "../style.css"; const Code = () => { const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState("delhi"); const getWeatherInfo = async () => { try { let url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${searchValue}& units=metric&appid=32909cb137e7e43fd288d514b88c62a6`; const res = await fetch(url); const data = await res.json(); console.log(data); } catch(error) { console.log(error); } } useEffect(() => { getWeatherInfo(); }, []) return (
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} />
{/* card template */}
25.5°
sunny
Delhi,India
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/* our four column section */}

); }; export default Code;
